snippet: Jon Ludwig Hammer and Radoslaw Wojtaszek have sharpened their game after serving as seconds at the World Chess Championship last fall.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that Jon Ludvig Hammer of Norway and Radoslaw Wojtaszek of Poland have won tournaments after serving as seconds during World Chess Championships.
lead_paragraph: Jon Ludwig Hammer and Radoslaw Wojtaszek have sharpened their game after serving as seconds at the World Chess Championship last fall.
